lstDialogOne: Todays members of the royal court have arrived
As always, they will bring about their requests before you for consideration
There..'requests' have been more and more forceful over the last few days
As you are aware, the state of the kingdom is urgent and dare I say..dire
The people suffer and become impatient
Our treasure is nearly empty. Our military almost exhausted. This is all thats left...|p1
Use the kingdoms resources wisely, or one day the people might come for your head on a pike
